items.name: Veg Kolhapuri
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked in onion & tomato based gravy with fresh spices topped with petals of onion, tomato and fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Kolhapuri Lamb Curry
items.description: A spicy and flavorful dish from the city of Kolhapur in Maharashtra, India. It is made with tender pieces of lamb cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy made with a blend of spices such as red chili, corriander, cumin and poppy seeds.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Tamarind Rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Bihari Dum Aloo
items.description: A popular dish originating from the state of Bihar, made with baby potatoes cooked in a spicy tomato and onion gravy. The dish is slow-cooked on low heat to infuse the flavors, resulting in soft, melt-in-your-mouth potatoes with a tangy and spicy taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bihari Chicken Curry
items.description: A spicy and flavorful dish from Bihar. It is made with marinated chicken cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy made with a blend of spices like cumin, corriander, ginger, garlic and mustard oil, giving it a distinct and delicious flavor
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Shallow fried spiced mashed potato wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with onions and frankie masala. Served with green chutney.

items.name: Idiyappam & Kadala Curry
items.description: A rice noodle dish from the south of India. Made of steamed rice flour noodles. Served with black chickpea curry.

items.name: Bandhakopir Tarkari
items.description: A comforting Bengali dish made with cabbage, peas and potatoes flavoured with Bengali garam masala and ghee.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bengali Chicken Bharta
items.description: A popular dish from the eastern region of India, particularly in Bengal. It is made by first roasting or grilling chicken until tender and then shredding it before cooking it with a flavorful mixture of onions, tomatoes, and spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Aloo Chop
items.description: A popular snack from the Eastern region of India, particularly in West Bengal. It is made by coating boiled and mashed potatoes with a mixture of spices and breadcrumbs, and then deep-frying until crispy and golden brown. (4 chop). Served with a side of green chutney.

items.name: Beetroot Coconut Pulao
items.description: Beetroot coconut pulao is a fragrant and colorful rice dish that combines the sweetness of beets with the creaminess of coconut milk. The pulao is cooked with aromatic spices and finished off with a garnish of toasted coconut flakes.

items.name: Matar Paneer
items.description: A classic North Indian dish made with soft paneer (cottage cheese) and green peas in a creamy tomato based sauce, flavored with fragrant spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Country Captain Chicken Curry
items.description: A Anglo-Indian dish made with chicken pieces cooked with potatoes in rich aromatic gravy made with a blend of spices like cloves, cardamon, chilli and pepper cooked in a onion-tomato based gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Rava Upma
items.description: Semolina cooked together with onion, tomato, carrot and green peas and topped with ghee. A perfect light meal.

items.name: Veg Pulao
items.description: Mixed vegtables cooked with whole spices and teamed with fragant basmati rice, caramalised onion and cashew nuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Kaikari Biryani
items.description: A vegetarian dish from the Indian subcontinent that combines fragrant basmati rice with a variety of fresh vegetables and aromatic spices, creating a delicious and flavorful meal that is enjoyed by many. Served with a side of yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Ambur Biryani
items.description: A popular biryani variety from the town of Ambur in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is made by cooking fragrant basmati rice with chicken, and a blend of spices like cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, and coriander. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Garlic Potato Wedges
items.description: A delicious and easy-to-make snack or side dish. The potato wedges are baked until crispy and then tossed with a mixture of butter, garlic, and herbs to give them a flavorful kick.

items.name: Karuvapellai Satham
items.description: A flavorful South Indian rice dish made with curry leaves and a variety of spices.

items.name: Himachali Chana Madra
items.description: A popular vegetarian dish from Himachal Pradesh. It's made with chickpeas (chana) cooked in a yogurt based gravy with aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Himachali Anardana Murg
items.description: A flavourful chicken preparation from Himachal Pradesh. Chicken is cooked in aromatic spices and dried pomegranate seeds that adds a unique tart and tangy flavour and a pinkish-reddish colour to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Honey Chilli Potato
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made by frying crispy potatoes and tossing them in a sweet and spicy sauce. The dish is a perfect combination of sweet, savory, and spicy flavors.

items.name: Neer Dosa
items.description: A popular South Indian crepe made with rice flour and coconut milk. The dish is known for its delicate texture and subtle flavor, and is served with spicy chutney and sambar. (3 dosas)

items.name: Aloo Gobi Posto
items.description: A classic Bengali dish made with potatoes, cauliflower, and poppy seed paste. The dish has a creamy texture and a subtle flavor that comes from the poppy seed paste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bengali Kancha Lonka Murgi
items.description: A spicy and flavorful Bengali chicken dish, made with green chilies, ginger and other aromatic spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer made with marinated and fried chicken pieces tossed in a spicy and tangy sauce.

items.name: Aloo Pyaz Paratha
items.description: Potatoes mixed with spices and onion, chilli and stuffed into whole wheat dough and flattened and cooked .

items.name: Paneer Makhni
items.description: Creamy buttery gravy made with onion, tomato, cashew, garlic & ginger with soft cottage cheese cubes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kerala Mackerel Curry
items.description: A popular fish curry from the South Indian state of Kerala, made with spicy coconut-based gravy and mackerel fish. The dish is known for its rich and creamy texture and is made with a blend of aromatic spices such as turmeric, coriander, and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Butter Garlic Mushrooms
items.description: A delicious and simple vegetarian dish made with saut√©ed mushrooms in a rich garlic and butter sauce.

items.name: Dal Tadka & Rice
items.description: A popular North Indian dish known for its comforting and satisfying flavor. Yellow lentils are cooked and tempered with spices and aromatic herbs and served with rice.

items.name: Rajasthani Gobi Rajwadi
items.description: A spicy and flavorful dish made with cauliflower cooked in a rich tomato and onion gravy. The dish is seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and finished off with a garnish of fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Maharashtrian Kolambi Masala
items.description: A flavorful Maharashtrian shrimp curry, made with a blend of aromatic spices and coconut. The dish is known for its spicy and tangy flavor and is made with fresh shrimp cooked in a thick gravy of onions, tomatoes, and coconut.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Street Style Moonglet
items.description: A popular Indian street food made with moong dal (split green gram) and vegetables cooked in a savory pancake-style dish. The moonglet is flavored with aromatic spices and can be customized with various toppings such as cheese, tomato, and onion.

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Veg Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies and spices and lots of flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies, chicken, spices lots flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Pahadi Paneer Tikka
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made with marinated paneer (cottage cheese) and grilled on skewers

items.name: Palak Lasuni Kichidi
items.description: Lasuni Palak Kichidi is a flavorful South Indian dish made with rice, lentils, spinach, and garlic. The dish is cooked with aromatic spices and finished off with a tempering of garlic and cumin seeds for added flavor.
